name: Beyond Terra
description:
City Bulding

Start with a small space station in Earth's orbit.
They must manage resources like oxygen, water, and energy to ensure the survival of the inhabitants, expand your space city, increase the population.
Players must also cater to the needs of their inhabitants by providing educational facilities, entertainment options, and healthcare services to maintain their satisfaction and well-being.

Collect and Explore

Collect minerals and resources by mining asteroids.
Combine materials and craft new stations, explore the moon and its secrets.

Player Base Building

Store your materials, buildung crafting and resources station.

Features

  • Base Bulding
  • Crafting
  • Mining
  • Exploring
  • Space Population
  • Build machines to create Energy, Water, Oxygen, Food
